textBeforeTable: TV Schedule Listen Live 11/30/2012 While the Pittsburgh Steelers have slipped to 6-5 on the season, the Baltimore Ravens are atop the AFC North at 9-2. Both teams know each other well, which will certainly make the game entertaining. With hopeful news of Antonio Brown’s return and the possible return of Troy Polamalu, it makes the opponent profile that much more interesting. Steelers Face Ravens For Week 13 Showdown In Baltimore Torey Smith
